item.title: Create configuration file
item.description:
Select the "src" source folder of the project.Then right-click and select New > Other.... Select DaoJones > DaoJonesConnection Configuration File and click Next.
Enter "taskexample" in the File name input field and click Finish. The Connections Editor appears.
In the Connections Editor click the "New Connection" button on the right-top of the connections section. In the details pane, enter the following values:
- Title: Email Database
- Use this connection per default: true
- Vendor: Notes Connection Factory
- Database: <The path to your local mail database>
Because you use the local Notes client, you do not have to specify host and credentials. Click Test connection from this machine to verify your input.
Save and close the file.
